# Horde Agence

> Horde is a Brussels-based digital agency specializing in UX design and high-performance web development. We design ultra-fast interfaces.

## About

Horde is a two-person agency founded by Nicolas Premont (Developer) and Alexandre (UX Designer), each with 9+ years of experience. Our philosophy: no project managers, no useless meetings — just direct collaboration between senior experts and your project.

We operate under Belgian law, based in Brussels. Our approach combines deep UX expertise with technical excellence to deliver websites and applications that are genuinely fast, accessible, and conversion-optimized.

Enhance and modernize your current website or application:

## Methodology

### 001 — Free Audit ("Understand before acting")
We start every engagement with a free diagnostic of your SEO, speed, and UX to identify real blockers. Clear, actionable answers with no strings attached.

### 002 — The Horde Engine ("Performance as standard")
Our proprietary technical architecture is purpose-built for ultra-fast interfaces. A robust product foundation that enables faster, better delivery on every project.

### 003 — Direct Cooperation ("Zero middlemen")
No endless email chains or unnecessary layers. Direct communication via Slack or WhatsApp. Real-time visibility into project progress at every stage.

## Technology Stack

- Astro 5 (static site generation & SSR)
- React / Preact (interactive components via Islands architecture)
- Tailwind CSS 4 (utility-first styling)
- Next.js (for appropriate projects)
- Node.js
- Keystatic CMS (file-based content management)
- Markdoc (rich content with embedded components)
- Matter.js (physics-based animations)
- Lenis (smooth scrolling)
- Vercel (hosting & deployment)
